modName: Crystalline Twilight - Azura Statue HD Textures
summary: New textures for the Azura statue with glowing crystal sun and moon.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#8258FA][font=impact][size=8]CRYSTALLINE TWILIGHT[/size]
[size=5]AZURA STATUE HD TEXTURES

[img]http://i.imgur.com/b4BxbS3.png[/img][/size][/font][/color][/center]
[font=Arial]Crystalline Twilight is a set of two new HD textures for the Azura statue that features glowing sun and moon crystals in pace of the default stone. The two types of textures available are:
[/font]
[font=Arial][size=3][b][color=#d9d2e9]Hewn Stone:[/color][/b] [/size]Smooth and slightly worn stone texture.
[b][color=#d9d2e9][size=3]Weathered Stone:[/size][/color][/b] Rough and aged stone texture.[/font]

[font=Arial]Both textures come in 2k and 4k resolutions.[/font]

[font=Arial]There is an optional .esp file that reduces the default amount of snow on the statue, adds some environmental lighting around the crystals, and applies the same LOD fix used in the Unofficial Skyrim Patch so that the statue never fades from view when at a distance. You do not need the .esp file to use the new textures, but it does add to the overall effect and can be safely merged with other .esp files to save load order space.[/font]


[color=#8258FA][font=impact][size=5]COMPATIBILITY [/size][/font][/color]

This mod alters the Azura statue mesh in order to add the glowing crystal texture. Due to this, any other mod that alters the Azura statue mesh will conflict.


[color=#8258FA][font=impact][size=5]ANYTHING ELSE?[/size][/font][/color]

Changelog can be found under the ReadMe tab.

Please remember to endorse a mod if you like it! Not only does it show authors you approve of their work, it makes it easier for other players to find mods they might otherwise miss. ;)

Thanks for your support!
